hero.title: Your Mental Health Journey Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Track your mood, connect with professionals, and build healthier habits with our comprehensive mental health platform.

features.title: Everything You Need for Mental Wellness
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools and features designed to support your mental health journey every step of the way.

moodTracking.title: Smart Mood Tracking
moodTracking.description: Track your emotions with our intuitive interface and gain insights into your mental health patterns.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.description: Get personalized recommendations and insights based on your mood patterns and behaviors.

professionalSupport.title: Professional Support
professionalSupport.description: Connect with licensed therapists and mental health professionals when you need expert guidance.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data is encrypted and secure. We prioritize your privacy and confidentiality above all else.

scheduling.title: Easy Scheduling
scheduling.description: Book appointments with mental health professionals directly through our platform.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Monitor your mental health journey with detailed analytics and progress reports.

howItWorks.title: How MindTrack Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with your mental health journey is simple and straightforward.

step1.title: Track Your Mood
step1.description: Log your daily emotions and feelings with our easy-to-use mood tracker.

step2.title: Get Insights
step2.description: Receive personalized insights and recommendations based on your patterns.

step3.title: Connect & Grow
step3.description: Connect with professionals and build healthier mental health habits.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have transformed their mental health journey with MindTrack.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: MindTrack has completely changed how I approach my mental health. The mood tracking feature helps me understand my patterns, and connecting with a therapist was seamless.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: As someone who struggles with anxiety, MindTrack's breathing exercises and professional support have been invaluable. I feel more in control of my mental health.

emma.name: Emma Rodriguez
emma.content: The insights I get from tracking my mood have helped me identify triggers and develop better coping strategies. Highly recommend MindTrack to anyone.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start your mental health journey with a plan that fits your needs and budget.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Mental Health?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have already started their journey to better mental wellness with MindTrack.

footer.description: Empowering individuals to take control of their mental health journey through technology and professional support.

auth.title: Sol
auth.subtitle: Your personal mental health companion. Track your mood, connect with professionals, and build healthier habits.
auth.joinToday: Join Sol today and take the first step towards better mental health.

auth.signUpDescription: Create a new account to start your mental health journey

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, Sarah! Here's your mental health overview.
dashboard.emotionalPatterns: Your emotional patterns over the past week

moodTracker.emotionSaved: Your mood has been saved successfully!
moodTracker.title: How are you feeling?
moodTracker.subtitle: Select your current emotional state
moodTracker.notePlaceholder: How are you feeling? What's on your mind?

joyful.name: Joyful
joyful.affirmation: I embrace the joy in my life and share it with others.

content.name: Content
content.affirmation: I am at peace with myself and my surroundings.

neutral.name: Neutral
neutral.affirmation: I accept my current state and remain open to what comes next.

anxious.name: Anxious
anxious.affirmation: This feeling is temporary. I am safe and I can handle this moment.

sad.name: Sad
sad.affirmation: It's okay to feel sad. My emotions are valid and will pass with time.

angry.name: Angry
angry.affirmation: I acknowledge my anger and choose how to respond to it constructively.

excited.name: Excited
excited.affirmation: I embrace this positive energy and direct it purposefully.

tired.name: Tired
tired.affirmation: I honor my body's need for rest and recovery.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
profile.bioDefault: I'm on a journey to better mental health and mindfulness. I enjoy meditation, reading, and spending time in nature.
